response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and unique features, it's worth more than $100 to us. Considering its value to you, we're offering it for $110. This price reflects the product's worth while also allowing us to make a reasonable profit. We believe this is an excellent opportunity for both of us. Please let me know if you're interested.", "product_price": 110}
